trans-unit.source: . Open the index.html in your browser to view them. It will also (due to -W) error out on any warning like Travis will. This is a good way to locally verify it will pass.
trans-unit.target: 。在浏览器中打开index.html进行查看。它也将（由于-W导致）在出现任何警告（例如Travis will）时出错。这是在本地验证它会通过的好方法。

trans-unit.source: analogio - analog input/output pins, using pin identities from board+microcontroller packages
trans-unit.target: Analogio-模拟输入/输出引脚，使用板+微控制器封装中的引脚标识

trans-unit.source: bitbangio - software-driven interfaces for I2C, SPI
trans-unit.target: bitbangio -I2C，SPI的软件驱动接口

trans-unit.source: board - breakout-specific pin identities
trans-unit.target: 电路板 -特定于插座的引脚标识

trans-unit.source: busio - hardware-driven interfaces for I2C, SPI, UART
trans-unit.target: busio -I2C，SPI，UART的硬件驱动接口

trans-unit.source: digitalio - digital input/output pins, using pin identities from board+microcontroller packages
trans-unit.target: digitalio-数字输入/输出引脚，使用板+微控制器封装中的引脚标识

trans-unit.source: microcontroller - chip-specific pin identities
trans-unit.target: 微控制器 -特定于芯片的引脚标识

trans-unit.source: time * - substitute functions monkey-patched to time module
trans-unit.target: 时间 *-猴子修补到时间模块的替代功能

trans-unit.target: 现在,一旦你激活了虚拟环境。

trans-unit.source: On supported GNU/Linux systems like the Raspberry Pi, you can install the driver locally from PyPI. To install for current user:
trans-unit.target: 在Raspberry Pi等受支持的GNU / Linux系统上，您可以从PyPI在本地安装驱动程序。要为当前用户安装：

trans-unit.source: Sphinx documentation
trans-unit.target: 斯芬克斯文件

trans-unit.source: Sphinx is used to build the documentation based on rST files and comments in the code. First, install dependencies (feel free to reuse the virtual environment from above):
trans-unit.target: Sphinx用于根据rST文件和代码中的注释来构建文档。首先,安装依赖关系(可以自由重用上面的虚拟环境)。

trans-unit.source: The Micropython compatibility layers described above are intended to provide a CircuitPython-like API for devices which are running CPython or Micropython. Since corresponding packages should be built-in to any standard CircuitPython image, they have no value on a device already running CircuitPython and would likely conflict in unhappy ways.
trans-unit.target: 上面描述的Micropython兼容层旨在为运行CPython或Micropython的设备提供类似CircuitPython的API。由于相应的包应该内置到任何标准的CircuitPython映像中,所以它们在已经运行CircuitPython的设备上没有价值,而且很可能会发生不愉快的冲突。

trans-unit.source: The test suites in the test/src folder under testing.universal are by design intended to run on either CircuitPython or Micropython+compatibility layer to prove conformance.
trans-unit.target: 在下的试验/ src文件夹的测试套件testing.universal是通过设计意图上运行或者 CircuitPython 或 Micropython +兼容层来证明一致性。

trans-unit.source: This repository contains a selection of packages mirroring the CircuitPython API on hosts running micropython. Working code exists to emulate the CircuitPython packages;
trans-unit.target: 这个资源库包含了一些在运行micropython的主机上镜像CircuitPython API的包。存在工作代码来模拟CircuitPython包。
